Posts.Content: JEONGJIN wrote: Hi I am 47years unmarried single woman. I was diagnosed with stage 1 on Lt breast cancer .1.3cm ER/PR (+/+) HER2 (-) There are two more small benign lumps sizing under 0.7cm.& cysts on Lt breast , Also ,1 lump on Rt breast size is around 0.7cm .it is benign. Dr gave me two options. one is lumpectomy with R.T & the other is Lt breast mastectomy . I am very confued now , I want to choose the best way. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: lumpectomy with R.T or mastectomy JEONGJIN Freya
